sentences.en: Children are the flowers of our motherland.
He devoted his life to the educational cause of the motherland.
sentences.cn: 他为祖国的教育事业贡献了一生.

sentences.en: He joined up to fight for his motherland.
Henry was forced to leave his motherland for political reasons.
sentences.cn: 由于政治原因,亨利被迫离开了他的祖国.

sentences.en: I am determined to give my youth to the motherland.
sentences.cn: 我决心把青春献给祖国.

sentences.en: Never forget our duty to our motherland.
sentences.cn: 牢记我们对祖国应尽的义务.

sentences.en: Our great motherland is favorably endowed climately.
sentences.cn: 我们祖国的气候(真是)得天独厚.

sentences.en: Our great motherland is flourishing with each passing day.
sentences.cn: 我们伟大的祖国蒸蒸日上.

sentences.en: Our motherland flows with natural resources.
sentences.cn: 我们祖国蕴藏着丰富的天然资源.

sentences.en: The face of our motherland has been changing with each passing day.
They are willing to die for the motherland.
sentences.cn: 他们愿为祖国牺牲生命。

sentences.en: We are determined to defend our motherland at all costs.
sentences.cn: 我们决心不惜任何代价保卫祖国.

sentences.en: We are proud of our motherland.
We must be loyal to our motherland.
We must defend our motherland from the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我们必须保卫祖国防御进犯之敌.

sentences.en: Your future is bound up with the fate of your motherland.
sentences.cn: 你的前途同祖国的命运紧密相联.

trans.tran_en: someone’s motherland is the country where they were born and to which they feel a strong emotional connection
